articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Shooting Contest of Teaching Staff of Military Universities
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Shooting Contest of Teaching Staff of Military Universities
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a shooting contest of teaching staff of military universities.
					 The contest was to test the marksmanship of teaching staff of military universities and let the whole army intensify the movement for becoming crack shots.
					
					 Kim Jong Un gave an instruction to start the contest.
					
					 It was divided into pistol shooting and automatic rifle shooting.
					
					 Watching the contest with deep attention, he said only when commanding officers have good marksmanship, can they prepare soldiers as crack shots. To this end, it is necessary for the whole teaching staff of the military educational institutions to acquire good marksmanship, he added.
					
					 Although soldiers are fully ready politically and ideologically and physically, they cannot satisfactorily perform their combat duties if they are not good at shooting, he noted, underlining the need for the People's Army to frequently hold shooting contests in order to raise a strong wind of firing drills.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University of Politics emerged a winner in the pistol shooting while Kim Il Sung Military University came first in the automatic rifle shooting. Kim Il Sung University of Politics placed first in total points.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said the contest proved once again that only when the commanding officers make it a rule and a part of everyday life to conduct a drill, placing it above all, can they prepare soldiers as crack shots capable of hitting targets at a single shot without fail under whatever conditions and circumstances.
					
					 Stressing that drills are essential for bolstering up military capabilities, he indicated important tasks to be fulfilled by the People's Army to round off its combat readiness and capabilities in every way.
					
					At the end of the contest there was a demonstration by players of the Pyongyang Air Club.
					
					Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So, and other commanding officers of the People's Army including members of the executive committee of the KPA committee of the WPK and teaching staff and cadets of the military universities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Central Zoo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Central Zoo
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the Central Zoo where projects are under way to build new buildings and remodel the existing ones.
					 He made the rounds of various objects now under construction and in the process of remodeling. 
					
					 He gave an instruction to build new buildings including a shed for penguins to suit the ecological characteristics of animals and provide the best convenience to visitors.
					
					 He underscored the need to build all structures being remodeled including the aquarium into good recreation places giving laughter and joy to visitors.
					
					 He instructed officials to pay deep attention to increasing the species of rare animals with ornamental effect and take thorough measures to fully supply food and water to animals and set up a perfect veterinary and anti-epizootic system while carrying out the project for remodeling the zoo.
					
					 He underlined the need to construct its main gate in such a way as to preserve well the features of the Central Zoo, build a sturgeon pond in it and successfully conduct its greening so as to fundamentally improve its environment.
					
					 He called for building in the zoo a comprehensive nature museum to help school youth and children and other people get a rich knowledge and common sense about fauna and flora.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that officials and workers of the zoo and relevant fields would successfully remodel the zoo within the timetable set by the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, Ri Jae Il, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Spokesman for Maritime Administration of DPRK on "Oil Tanker Incident" in Libya
articles.content:
Spokesman for Maritime Administration of DPRK on "Oil Tanker Incident" in Libya
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Maritime Administration of the DPRK Wednesday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA in connection with the recent DPRK-flagged "oil tanker incident" which occurred in Libya:
					 On March 8 the government of Libya informed the DPRK of the fact that the DPRK-flagged oil tanker Morning Glory made an oil contract with an individual armed group in Libya and illegally entered a port under the control of the group in the eastern part of Libya, and urged the DPRK to take a necessary measure for settling it through a formal channel.
					
					 As far as the oil tanker is concerned, it is a ship run by the Golden East Logistics Company in Alexandria, Egypt and is allowed to temporarily use the DPRK flag for six months in accordance with the contract made by the company with the DPRK at the end of February.
					
					 Right after being informed of the fact by the Libyan side, the DPRK strongly blamed the company side for the violation of the contract and demanded it let the ship leave the port at once without loading oil.
					
					 In addition to it, the DPRK formally notified the Libyan government and the International Maritime Organization that it cancelled and deleted the ship's DPRK registry and invalidated all the certificates as the ship violated the DPRK's law on the registry of ships and the contract that prohibited it from transporting contraband cargo and entering the warring, dispute-torn or natural disaster-affected areas.
					
					 Therefore, the ship has nothing to do with the DPRK at present and it has no responsibility whatsoever as regards the ship.
					
					 What matters is that some foreign media are making much fuss, deliberately linking the case with the DPRK, claiming that "the north Korean ship tried to purchase oil from Libya in an illegal manner" and "the government force of Libya opened fire on the north Korean flagged oil tanker." 
					
					 Some forces are misleading the public opinion, persistently linking the issue with the DPRK. This is obviously aimed at achieving a sinister political purpose to tarnish its image.
					
					 They should clearly know that with neither false propaganda nor mud-slinging can they damage the image of the dignified DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Cambodian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Cambodian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun had a talk with new Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Op Sisawada, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Visit Silk Mill
articles.content:
Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Visit Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian charge d'affaires ad interim here, and his embassy officials visited the DPRK-Syria Friendship Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Wednesday on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					 The guests laid a bouquet before a mosaic portraying President Kim Il Sung finding himself among reeling workers and went round various production processes, being briefed on the proud history of the mill.
					
					 At the end of the visit Tammam Sulaiman said:
					
					 I was deeply moved to look round the mill wonderfully built under the deep care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The mill is positively contributing to the material and cultural life of the people by effecting a surge in production in the spirit of self-reliance despite the moves of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Seeing the achievements made by the mill in recent years, we can know well about the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Guidance over Revolutionary Drama Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Guidance over Revolutionary Drama Marked
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A performance was given at the National Theatre on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's guidance over the creation of the revolutionary drama "Blood at an International Conference".
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the original policy of bringing about a drastic turn in the dramatic art, energetically led the work to create Korean-style drama and opened a great heyday of the Juche art.
					
					 The revolutionary drama clarified the idea that dependence on foreign forces leads to a ruined country and independence should be achieved through a struggle with consciousness of national independence, vividly representing the phase of the times and life of people of all social standings in the then society. 
					
					 The performers made a vivid artistic representation of the aggressive nature of the imperialists remaining unchanged no matter how much water flows under the bridge, their craftiness and the truth of history that to hold high the banner of independence is the only way for defending the dignity and honor of the nation. 
					
					 Through the performance the audience keenly realized once again the people who lost their country suffered untold hardships as they were not led by the great leader. They also felt great national pride and self-esteem of being blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation as they are holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Among the audience were officials, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the fields of literature and art and art education.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nepali FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepali FM
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Mahendra Bahadur Pandey upon his appointment as foreign minister of Nepal.
					 The message wished the foreign minister success in his new job, expressing belief that good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Wrecker of Stability in Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Wrecker of Stability in Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear submarine Columbus and its flagship of the 7th Fleet, Blue Ridge, recently came into Pusan Port in south Korea, where the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are going in full swing.
					 Such action is arousing serious concern from among the world community as it is aimed to provoke a nuclear war in the Korean Peninsula by driving the regional situation to the worst crisis.
					
					 The Korean nation's desire and demand for improved north-south relations are now growing stronger in the peninsula thanks to the DPRK's leading role. But, the U.S. renders the situation tense with such port-call of warships, in a bid to check the improvement of north-south relations, get on the DPRK's nerves militarily and then destroy the stability in the peninsula.
					
					 Such being the fact, the U.S. and its followers have pulled up the DPRK over its regular rocket launching drills for bolstering the self-defensive military muscle, branding them as a "provocation" intended to "key up" the situation in and around the peninsula. This is a deceptive trick to cover their true colors as a wrecker of peace and stability in the peninsula and divert the attention of the world public to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. openly launched the joint military exercises against the DPRK and even introduced such strategic strike means for preemptive attack as nuclear submarine. So, it is the height of impudence for the U.S. to make noise about the DPRK's regular rocket launching drills.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. regarding the Korean Peninsula as a springboard for realizing its Asia-Pacific strategy dislikes any good results to be made by the DPRK's efforts for improved north-south relations and national reconciliation and unity. The real intention of the U.S. is to spoil the atmosphere for improved north-south relations, a hindrance to the realization of its strategy by getting on the DPRK's nerves to the full to invite military countermeasures from it and then launching anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 In this way the U.S. seeks to cover up its colors as an aggressor swimming against the world trend toward peace and detente and shift the blame for aggravated regional situation on to the DPRK.
					
					 Anyhow, nothing can cover up the U.S. nature as an aggressor posing constant danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula in disregard of its peoples' demand, and blocks the reunification of it.
					
					 The U.S. takes no account of the destiny and existence of the Korean nation.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out in the struggle to foil the U.S. moves for aggression on the DPRK, rejecting its policy of national estrangement.

articles.title: National Unity Serves as Powerful Weapon to Achieve National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
National Unity Serves as Powerful Weapon to Achieve National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation should hold high the banner of national unity to put an end to distrust and confrontation and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is necessary to put the interests common to the nation before anything else and, on its basis, achieve unity.
					
					 Those who truly want the country's reunification and the prosperity of the nation should abandon the narrow-minded conception of confrontation and give priority to and defend the interests of the nation, regardless of individual isms and party interests.
					
					 Only when one gives priority to the interests common to the nation and subordinate everything to them from the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, national unity will be achieved of its own accord.
					
					 When all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad visit each other, have contact and strengthen solidarity and alliance on the road for reunification and patriotism, understanding and trust will be deepened and reconciliation and cooperation be promoted.
					
					 It is necessary to positively create the atmosphere of the country's reunification by removing all hurdles fostering distrust and confrontation with compatriots and hampering the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Intolerable are the acts of hindering the national reconciliation and unity including harmful slandering and reckless war exercises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawing U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawing U.S. Forces from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the United States made public a plan for reducing its armed forces. It was reported that the U.S. forces overseas would be reduced according to the plan. But, the U.S. forces in south Korea were excluded from the plan. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is increasing its forces in south Korea, not reducing them. They are the wrecker of peace and the source of a war.
					
					 To look back on history, the Korean nation suffered the tragedy of a fratricidal war and the Korean peninsula has turned into the biggest hotspot in the world where the constant danger of a war is prevailing. This is because the U.S. has occupied south Korea.
					
					 Not a day has passed by in south Korea without the U.S. war exercises for aggression since its occupation of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea have played the role guaranteeing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. has mobilized huge war equipment whenever war drills are staged in south Korea every year, making its forces in south Korea adept at them.
					
					 It is an empty talk to call for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia with the U.S. keeping its forces in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is spreading a false rumor as if the U.S. forces in south Korea should exist to "ensure peace and stability" on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia. Lurking behind this is its sinister intention.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that only when it puts the Korean peninsula under control can it contain the surrounding big powers with the peninsula as a springboard.
					
					 In order to defuse tensions on the peninsula and ensure peace and stability in Northeast Asia, the U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes U.S.-touted Fiction of "Nuclear Bombing"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes U.S.-touted Fiction of "Nuclear Bombing"
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, U.S. Senator Rubio widely expected to be the next presidential candidate from the U.S. Republican Party said north Korea has access to nukes and even missiles capable of reaching the U.S. mainland and that after 10 years it would make a nuclear bomb attack on California or western coastal area of the mainland.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. has stockpiled the greatest number of nukes in the world and made inter-continental ballistic missile launches and nuclear tests incomparably more than any other countries. But it brands the DPRK as an "assailant" of threat, finding fault with the latter over its launching of several rockets, not befitting a "superpower." This is just the scoff of the world.
					
					 The U.S. termed the DPRK's regular rocket launching drills a "provocation" and is now spreading even a fiction of "nuclear bombing" on its mainland. Lurking behind this is its sinister intention.
					
					 This is a childish jealousy and last-ditched effort of those taken aback by the self-defensive capabilities, great vitality of socialism and overall national power of the DPRK.
					
					 Those regarding the DPRK's successful building of a thriving nation as a nightmare and the U.S. regarding the DPRK as a thorn in its flesh are trembling with fear. That is why the U.S. is shuddering.
					
					 The U.S. has nothing to say even if we launch more powerful missiles.
					
					 Nuclear weapons are not a monopoly of the U.S. It had better behave with discretion.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps (five kinds of individual stamps) showing modern edifices and folk games.
					 Those edifices are the apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and the Okryu Children's Hospital, built in Pyongyang last year, and the games are wrestling, archery and horse riding the Koreans have enjoyed from olden times.

articles.title: DPRK Concentrates Efforts on Production of Farming Materials
articles.content:
DPRK Concentrates Efforts on Production of Farming Materials
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Different economic sectors in the DPRK are speeding up the production of farming equipment and materials.
					 Ssangryong, Tongam and other mines across the country are increasing ore production for supply of phosphate fertilizer to farms. 
					
					 The Haeju Smeltery and a fertilizer factory in Jongju have introduced advanced methods to increase the fertilizer production.
					
					 The Kumsong Tractor Factory has produced thousands of toothed wheels by exploiting internal reserves, while the Huichon Precision Machine Plant and the Ryangchaek Bearing Factory have stepped up the production of fuel pumps and accessories for farm machines. 
					
					 Metal industrial establishments, including the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Chollima Steel Complex, provided hundreds of tons of pig iron and a great deal of scrap iron to producers of farm machine accessories.
					
					 As of early March, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex raised the output of Juche fertilizer (fertilizer made in the Korean way) 1.6 times that in the same period of last year. Power and coal industrial and railway transport sectors, too, are working hard to help this complex increase the fertilizer production.

articles.title: Development of Ice Hockey in DPRK
articles.content:
Development of Ice Hockey in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A division-1 men's ice hockey contest recently took place here as part of the Paektusan Prize Sports Games.
					 The Sports Team of the Ministry of Fisheries beat its rival of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau 6:1 in the finals, against the expectation of experts and fans. Such results were attributable to the high technique in goal-area defence and good shot, according to referees.
					
					 In the match this team tightened defence in the goal area with tactical changes of formation, different from the past ways based on physical strength, while beefing up defence in the offensive area to press on the rival team.
					
					 After all, the contest made the team of the Ministry of Fisheries emerge the strongest in the country. It also showed that scientific competition ways and players' mental state play a decisive role in match.

articles.title: Sowing of Spring Wheat, Barley Concluded in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Sowing of Spring Wheat, Barley Concluded in North Phyongan Province
 Sinuiju, March 11 (KCNA) -- The co-op farms in North Phyongan Province of the DPRK have finished sowing spring wheat and barley.
					 The officials and agricultural workers in Yomju, Sonchon and Unjon counties made plans for sowing each field and patch on the principle of the right crop in the right season and the right crop on the right soil, mobilized all their efforts and carried out their daily plans.
					
					 Giving priority to seed supply, Jongju City and Cholsan County finished sowing by doing all farming work including ploughing as demanded by the Juche method of farming.
					
					 Phihyon, Uiju and other counties also concluded sowing of spring wheat and barley as demanded by technical regulations.
					
					 The agricultural workers in the province are pushing ahead with the immediate farming work such as preparations for sowing rice cold-beds.

articles.title: DPRK Free from Tax: Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Free from Tax: Korean in U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Chinese internet paper Liaoning Sinmun on March 7 carried a travelogue on the homeland contributed by a Korean in the U.S. under the title "Korea, a mysterious country".
					 The tax system serves as a means for plunder against working people in capitalist society, the travelogue said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK is free from tax.
					
					 It totally eliminated agricultural tax in kind in 1966 and enforced the Law "On Abolishing the Tax System" in 1974, becoming the first free-tax country in the world.
					
					 When I visited the DPRK for the first time, I had deep impressions after being told that there is no tax in the country. It has become a common sense that one should know that there is no tax in the DPRK if one wants to visit it.

articles.title: Japan Hit for Denying Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Hit for Denying Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Glendale City, California on Mar. 8 to denounce Japan for denying the crimes related to sexual slavery and trying to revive militarism, according to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S. on Mar. 9.
					 Present at the meeting were Koreans in the U.S. and members of a women's human rights organization of the U.S.
					
					 Speakers accused Japanese ultra-right forces of working hard to remove the statue of a "comfort girl," which lays bare Japan's crimes related to sexual slavery, in Glendale City.
					
					 They said that Japan committed unprecedented crimes, mercilessly trampling on the dignity and rights of Korean and other Asian women in the past.
					
					 The victims of the sexual slavery have suffered mental and physical pains all their lives, but Japan has so far made no apology and reparation, they charged.
					
					 Japan should be condemned for its war crimes, they said, calling upon countries of the world not to overlook Japan keen on the moves to deny its past crimes, distort history and revive militarism, they said.
					
					 There also took place a demonstration in Los Angeles on the same day to denounce Japan's unethical crimes and demand the women's rights. It was attended by members of women's organizations and peace organizations.

articles.title: Acts of Repressing Freedom of Expression Exposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acts of Repressing Freedom of Expression Exposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean weekly paper Media Today on March 5 said that the broadcasting and communication committee of south Korea is repressing the freedom of expression  on websites under the pretext of the "Security Law".
					 According to it, the committee deleted more than 6 000 things posted on websites in the past six years, forcibly demanding their correction.
					
					 A member of the committee disclosed that it is abusing its authority, demanding an unconditional correction of anything which praises the north.
					
					 The south Korean Press Trade Union said that the committee issued an official document last year urging to delete what praises the north's social system or introduces its policies.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Terming DPRK's Self-Defensive Drills "Provocation"
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Terming DPRK's Self-Defensive Drills "Provocation"
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "We condemn U.S. brigandish sophism" on Mar. 7.
					 The statement said that the recent rocket launching drills conducted by units of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army according to their regular training plans are entirely the just self-defensive actions on the territorial air and waters and land of the DPRK to defend the country and the people and safeguard the regional peace. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is describing its war exercises for aggression in the land of other country as "defensive" and "annual" but terming the DPRK's just self-defensive drills in its own land "provocation". This is the height of the U.S. arrogant and shameless acts.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presents itself, the U.S. has deliberately escalated tensions on the Korean peninsula under absurd pretexts.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop acting rashly, not forgetting even a moment that all the service personnel and people of the DPRK are whetting bayonets of hatred and retaliation to resolutely settle accounts with the U.S., which caused the painful nearly 70 year-long-history of national division.

articles.title: U.S. Rebuffed for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Rocket Launching Drills
articles.content:
U.S. Rebuffed for Taking Issue with DPRK over Its Rocket Launching Drills
						
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China in a statement on March 7 warned that the U.S. should not take issue with the DPRK over its rocket launching drills.
					 The DPRK's self-defensive rocket launching drills are the just and self-defensive military acts to defend the sovereignty, security, peace of the country with arms, the statement said.
					
					 But the U.S. is letting loose nonsensical sophism that the drills are a "low-level provocation" and "violation of the UN Security Council's resolutions", it charged.
					
					 The DPRK repeatedly demanded a halt to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, but the U.S. and its followers are bringing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war while staging the brigandish joint military exercises targeting the north by mobilizing a nuclear submarine and latest nuclear war hardware, it noted.
					
					 No country in the world will remain a passive onlooker to the war exercises threatening it with nuclear war hardware, it said.
					
					 All the Korean economic workers resident in China positively support the just self-defensive measures of the DPRK and strongly demand the U.S. and its followers stop the war exercises at once, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on March 1 in support of "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 His speech serves as important guidelines for socialist construction, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We appeal to not only the followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea but all socialists and anti-imperialist fighters to deeply study this speech.
					
					 The Korean people will raise a fierce wind of fresh ideological revolution, true to his historic speech, and sweep away all sorts of corrupt imperialist and capitalist ideas on the earth.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will always win a brilliant victory under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, a prominent leader of the Korean revolution and the world revolution, holding high the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Nepali Paper Introduces Juche Idea
articles.content:
Nepali Paper Introduces Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Arpan carried an article titled "Guiding principle of the Juche idea" on Mar. 7.
					 Under the subtitles "Independent stand should be maintained" and "Juche in ideology" the paper gave a detailed account of the guiding principle of the Juche idea.
					
					 The struggle to establish Juche and reject flunkeyism is a very important issue of deciding the destiny of revolution, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK rejected flunkeyism and established Juche in ideology and is waging a dynamic struggle for the final victory of revolution.

articles.title: Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Il Sung University Opens
articles.content:
Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Il Sung University Opens 
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The 29th Festival of Science and Technology of Kim Il Sung University opened with a due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 Teachers, researchers and post-graduate students of the university presented to the festival more than 290 data greatly conducive to developing latest science and technology of the country and putting the national economy on a Juche, modern and scientific basis at a higher phase by combining science and technology with production.
					
					 The festival, divided into 13 panels, will show sci-tech successes in the vanguard sectors, basic industrial sectors, and basic and cutting-edge science sectors.
					
					 It will also serve its visitors with new technologies developed by the university.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants looked round the festival venue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Posted by Chilean Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Posted by Chilean Political Party on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The full text of "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive", a speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea, was posted by the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) on its website on March 4.
					 The website said in a preface:
					
					 The WPK is defending the DPRK and making a victorious advance because it is taking hold on the ideological work.
					
					 At the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the WPK Kim Jong Un analyzed the shortcomings in the present ideological work and its necessity when a decisive struggle for socialism is being waged, and made a precious speech for developing the ideological work at a higher stage.
					
					 His speech serves as important guidelines as it dealt a blow to the moves of the anti-socialist and counter-revolutionary elements to arrest the advance of advantageous socialist Korea, a beacon of hope for the world workers and other people, and developed the socialist idea.
					
					 The Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action) calls on not only its party members but all other people struggling for the people's democratic revolution, socialist revolution and interests of the workers and other people to deeply study this speech which will make a great contribution to enlightening and training fighters aspiring after independence and socialism for its profound idea and validity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Parque Zoologico Nacional en reconstruccion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Parque Zoologico Nacional en reconstruccion
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Parque Zoologico Nacional que se reconstruye de nuevo.
					 El Mariscal recorrio varios objetos que estan construyendose o reconstruyendose.
					
					 Instruyo que deben construir jaulas de pinguinos y otras nuevas edificaciones conforme al caracter ecologico de los animales y acondicionarlos para que aseguren mejores comodidades a los visitantes.
					
					 Dijo que deben acondicionar todos los objetos en reconstruccion, incluido el acuario, como agradables lugares de descanso que puedan dar alegria y risas al pueblo.
					
					 Enseno la necesidad de prestar profunda atencion a la labor de aumentar el numero de especies de los animales raros y de buen efecto decorativo reconstruyendo el Parque Zoologico Nacional y de establecer perfectamente las medidas para el suministro de pienso y el agua y el sistema de prevencion veterinaria.
					
					 Subrayo que es preciso construir la puerta principal del parque adecuada a la particularidad del parque zoologico, formar el tanque de esturion y mejorar radicalmente el ambiente periferico mediante la creacion de areas verdes.
					
					 Tambien ordeno construir el museo de naturaleza general capaz de dar a los jovenes, ninos escolares y trabajadores abundantes conocimientos sobre los animales y plantas.
					
					 El Mariscal expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y trabajadores del Parque Zoologico Nacional y de la rama correspondiente reconstruiran magnificamente el parque dentro del tiempo fijado por el partido.
					
					 Le acompanaron al Mariscal, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Jae Il, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de instructores de academias militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de instructores de academias militares
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio la competencia de tiro de los instructores de las academias militares.
					 La competencia fue efectuada para evaluar el arte de tiro de los instructores de academias militares y avivar mas en todo el ejercito el fervor para hacerse tiradores certeros.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo dio la orden de comenzar la competencia.
					
					 Los partidos fueron realizados divididos en el de pistola y el de fusil automatico.
					
					 Observando con atencion la competencia, el Comandante Supremo apunto que al tener buen arte de tiro, los oficiales pueden formar a los militares como tiradores excelentes y para este fin, todos los instructores de los organos de la educacion militar deben poseer buen arte de tiro.
					
					 Diciendo que si los militares no tienen el buen arte de tiro aunque esten bien preparados tanto en lo ideo-politico como en lo fisico, no pueden cumplir con satisfaccion las misiones de combate asumidas, ordeno organizar a menudo la competencia de tiro para levantar una oleada de los ejercicios de tiro en el EPC.
					
					 La Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung gano en el tiro de pistola y la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, en el tiro de fusil automatico y la primera obtuvo la victoria en general.
					
					 El Mariscal menciono que la competencia de hoy confirmo otra vez que solo cuando sean sistematizados y acostumbrados los ejercicios dandoles prioridad, se puede formar a los militares como tiradores certeros que nunca yerran en cualquiera condicion y ambiente.
					
					 Apunto que los ejercicios constituyen lo principal en el fortalecimiento del poderio militar y presento las tareas programaticas para completar por todos los medios los preparativos y la capacidad de combate del EPC.
					
					 Al termino de la competencia de tiro, hubo la presentacion modelo de los jugadores del club de aeronautica de Pyongyang
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y otros comandantes del EPC, asi como los instructores y estudiantes de las academias militares.

articles.title: Portavoz de delegacion nortena al contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur aclara posicion de principios
articles.content:
Portavoz de delegacion nortena al contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur aclara posicion de principios
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la delegacion de la parte nortena al contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea publico el dia 11 una declaracion exponiendo la posicion  de principios de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en relacion con que se encuentra en dilema la ejecucion del acuerdo alcanzado en ese contacto dificilmente preparado.
					 La nota recuerda que cada vez que tengan la oportunidad, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan ruidosamente de la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur y el asentamiento de la base de reunificacion, mediante la "creacion de confianza".
					
					 Pero, ellas no cesan la difamacion a la parte connacional y llegaron a calumniar hasta las recientes elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					 La declaracion prosigue:
					
					1. Las mismas autoridades surcoreanas deben hablar con prudencia.
					
					 Ahora las autoridades surcoreanas estan al frente de la campana de difamacion y calumnia sin hacer caso al acuerdo logrado en el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur.
					
					 El ministro surcoreano de Relaciones Exteriores sigue pronunciando disparates provocativos y arrogantes como que si bien el Norte libra la ofensiva de dialogo, practicamente, "esta enfrascado en los actos provocadores" como exigir la suspension de los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y "no muestra ningun gesto de cambio".
					
					 El ministro surcoreano de Unificacion, enloquecido en la censura a la parte connacional, dijo unas palabras tan repugnantes como que si el Norte no cumple la promesa, "no recibira nada", lo cual causa gran indignacion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					 No sera exagerado decir que los ministros surcoreanos relacionados con los asuntos con el Norte pretenden convertir todo el territorio surcoreano en el crisol de calumnias y censuras a la RPDC.
					
					 Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen de veras el interes  en la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur, deberan hablar con prudencia cerrando sus bocas causantes de todas las calamidades. 
					
					2. Los medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea tambien deberan portarse con prudencia.
					
					 Ahora, si los periodicos conservadores como "Chosun Ilbo", "Choongang Ilbo" y "Dong-A Ilbo" publican informaciones tendenciosas inventando hechos inexistentes, las cadenas de radio como "KBS", "MBC" y "SBS" divulgan a porfia otros reportes fraudulentos. 
					
					 Los medios surcoreanos no deben ser colectivos de plumiferos pagados que siendo sirvientes del poder travieso, fomentan la desconfianza, la hostilidad y la division, sino han de ser conductores amantes de la nacion y el pueblo que contribuyan a la reconciliacion nacional y la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					3. Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben dar mas la proteccion militar a la chusma ni hacerle lanzar volantes de contenido anti-RPDC.
					
					 Los llamados "fugitivos norcoreanos" son escorias humanas que han sido abandonadas incluso por sus familiares y parientes por haber cometido todas las maldades en la RPDC como asesinato, latrocinio, lujuria y corrupcion.
					
					 !Que pobre y mezquina es la conducta de las autoridades surcoreanas que tratan de difamar y enfrentarse con la parte connacional cooperando con aquellas basuras de la epoca!
					
					 Hemos enviado ya dos veces a Chongwadae los mensajes advirtiendo que las autoridades surcoreanas no podran conseguir nada si no suspenden la difamacion y la calumnia como lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC. 
					
					 Bajo el absurdo pretexto de la "libertad de palabra, mitin y asociacion", las autoridades surcoreanas dicen que "no pueden restringir las calumnias anti-RPDC si no hay razones evidentes".
					
					 Si siguen actuando de esa manera, ellas demostraran por si solas su incapacidad y deben saber al mismo tiempo que no podran eludir la responsabilidad del empeoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					 Tuvo lugar el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur en medio de la gran esperanza y atencion de todos los compatriotas y se logro en esa ocasion un valioso acuerdo nacional.
					
					 Pero supera la imaginacion lo que sucedio en menos de un mes desde entonces.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que el respeto a la contraparte y el cumplimiento sincero del acuerdo posibilitaran la "creacion de confianza", que ellas hablan tanto, y abriran el horizonte amplio en las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					 Ahora no es el tiempo de enganar a la nacion con palabras lisonjeras.
					
					 Observaremos atentamente la actitud y el movimiento de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda nuevamente retirada de tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda nuevamente retirada de tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos publico un plan, segun el cual se reducira el numero de efectivos norteamericanos estacionados en ultramar, excepto a las tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea. 
					 En efecto, EE.UU. no reduce sus fuerzas armadas estacionadas en suelo surcoreano sino las aumenta. 
					
					 Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles calificando a EE.UU. de perturbador de la paz y causa de guerra.
					
					 Desde el punto de vista historico, debido a la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por parte de EE.UU., la nacion coreana sufrio la tragedia de conflicto armado fratricida y la Peninsula Coreana se ha convertido en la zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					 Desde el primer dia de la presencia militar norteamericana en suelo surcoreano, no pararon ahi ni un dia los ejercicios de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					 Las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea cumplen el papel de garantizar con armas la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					 Cada vez que se desarrollaban todos los anos en el Sur de Corea los ejercicios de guerra, EE.UU. introdujo enormes pertrechos de guerra para adiestrar a sus uniformados con los mismos. 
					
					 Dado que EE.UU. mantiene la presencia militar en la mitad de la Peninsula Coreana, la paz y la estabilidad de esta y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico no pasan de ser palabras vacias. 
					
					 EE.UU. difunde el rumor erroneo de que sus tropas deben estar presentes en el Sur de Corea para la "paz" y la "estabilidad" de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico, el cual parte de su siniestra intencion de controlar toda la Peninsula Coreana y utilizarla como trampolin en doblegar a las potencias perifericas. 
					
					 Para eliminar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y asegurar la paz y estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico, hay que sacar a las tropas norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta el rumor de "bombardeo nuclear" difundido por EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta el rumor de "bombardeo nuclear" difundido por EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el senador norteamericano Rubio, considerado como candidato republicano a la proxima presidencia, dijo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tiene ahora las armas nucleares y los misiles capaces de alcanzar hasta el territorio de Estados Unidos.
					 Continuo que si pasan asi 10 anos, la RPDC podra "bombardear con armas nucleares" el estado de California o las costas occidentales del territorio nacional de EE.UU.
					
					  Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este miercoles un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					  Estados Unidos es el primer portador de armas nucleares del mundo y realiza mas que nadie el lanzamiento de misiles balisticos intercontinentales y la prueba nuclear.
					
					 En contraste a su imagen de "superpotencia", EE.UU. califica ahora a la RPDC de "amenazante" por haber lanzado hace poco unos cohetes.
					
					  EE.UU. cuestiono el rutinario entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes de la RPDC como "acto provocador" y difunde hasta el rumor del "bombardeo nuclear".
					
					  Esto es una expresion de envidia de los acobardados ante la capacidad autodefensiva y el poderio integral de la RPDC y la vitalidad del socialismo coreano.
					
					  Ellos consideran como pesadilla la llegada de la RPDC a la cima de Estado prospero.
					
					  EE.UU., espantado por el lanzamiento de unos cohetes, no podra decir nada aunque la RPDC dispare misiles mas potentes que los lanzados recientemente.
					
					  El arma nuclear no es medio monopolizado por el imperio.
					
					  El imperio norteamericano debe actuar con prudencia.
